name: Yang Gang Thang Free
description:
Free mobile version Android only!

Tap to hover higher.. Release to fire and bombard with your thought bombs..

Help Yang hoverboard his way to the presidency by thought bombing through political slime, media blackouts, the polls, automation, A.I. and more..

Bombard the ballot boxes to empower your energy field and you can fly to victory crushing all before you like Goku… That's how politics works. right?

A casual game that's like Scramble with flappy birdish controls.. So just another of those side scrolling political satire shooters...

Features:

  •  108 levels
  • Classical piano soundtrack, proven 80% less annoying than shooter sfx
  • Hoverboard physics based on real Area 51 hoverboards
  • Moments of god like power...
  • Asphyxiophiliac trigger warning: contains images of neckties
  • Ads only on a few lower levels
  • No repetitive zap kapow noises
  • Tranquil at low levels, hectic at higher ones
  • Ever increasing speed!
  • Walls of AI and crack-shot slime cannons
